name: KILLMAGE
description:
Originally made for the 1-BIT JAM under the title "AIM SHOOT KILL", KILLMAGE is a fast-paced arena survival with simple mechanics and tight gameplay. Master movement, power of your staff, and the enemies to reach the highest time possible. Do not go gentle into that good night, kill them all.

FEATURES
  • Tight Gameplay
    With simple controls and direct approach, master the gameplay while fighting in the Vault. Spray down enemies with continuous fire or shoot a timed blast at larger groups, use the blast to launch yourself into the air and rain down from above.
  • Unique Visuals
    Take in the breathtaking minimal color palette with stark contrast and hard edges galore. No built-in anti-aliasing, transparencies, or shadows; two colors is all you need. You may adjust the colors in the options.
  • The Compendium
    See overall progress and complete challenges to unlock additional staffs, game modes, view stats and high scores in the unique area of the Compendium.
